name: storageCreateFile
description: Create a new file. The user who creates the file will automatically be assigned to read and write access unless he has passed custom values for read and write arguments.

read.description: An array of strings with read permissions. By default only the current user is granted with read permissions. [learn more about permissions](/docs/permissions) and get a full list of available permissions.

write.description: An array of strings with write permissions. By default only the current user is granted with write permissions. [learn more about permissions](/docs/permissions) and get a full list of available permissions.

$ul: **dateCreated**: File creation date in Unix timestamp.
